REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1738 reute u f BC-BSN-<BSN>-BUYS-STAKE 06-29 0044

TEXT.TITLE: BSN <BSN> BUYS STAKE IN MACGREGOR <MGS>
TEXT.BODY: BSN Corp said it holds less than five pct of MacGregor Sporting Goods. The company said the stock was acquired through recent open market purchases and the stake does not require specific disclosure. Reuter
